[General Libraries]

Detailed Description

Overview
This library is used to storage a data struct into a Dataflash. It depends of Dataflash (df) KAIKA library.

Function Documentation

u08 dataStorageClear ( void   ) 

Clear the memory Returns an error code. Zero for no errors.

u08 dataStorageInit ( void   ) 

Initializes the data storage library. Returns an error code. Zero for no errors.

void dataStorageParamLoad ( void   ) 

Load parameters Load the parameters from the Dataflash into SRAM

void dataStorageParamSave ( void   ) 

Save parameters Save the parameters into the Dataflash from SRAM

void dataStorageReadInit ( void   ) 

Initializes the counter to the read Preparer to sequential read process.

u08 dataStorageReadNext ( void   ) 

Read a block of data into the data storage struct Increment the counters after the storage process. Returns an error code. Zero for no errors.

u08 dataStorageWrite ( void   ) 

Storage the data in the dataStorage into Dataflash Increment the counters after the storage process. Returns an error code. Zero for no errors.
